title: Episode 26 - "Switcheroo"
synopsis: You'll need a scorecard to keep track of who's who when Space Ghost's evil twin brother Chad tries to take over the show!  In between coup attempts, Space Ghost and Chad interview special guests Thuthan... Susan Olsen and Elvira, Mistress of the Dark.(Synopsis by Lance Slacksless)

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed
WAITING

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It seems that every time I use the men's room around here, there's no toilet tissue. Is it too much to ask that when you people use up the toilet tissue, you replace it? Is that so hard? It's not brain surgery, y'know.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't look at me! I don't use the men's room! I use the little mantis's room, down the hall.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I don't go to the bathroom.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Get out! Everyone goes to the bathroom! Even Audrey Hepburn went to the bathroom!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, I don't! My metabolism naturally processes all my body waste. No muss, no fuss.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's disgusting.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aaaah, you're just jealous.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set) Greetings, citizens! I'm Space Ghost! Joining us tonight, little miss Cindy Brady herself, Susan Olsen! And, that scary Halloween schtickster girl, Elvira.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, get on with it! Space Ghost glares at Zorak and invisos over to desk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My first guest is that adorable little Brady moppet, the youngest one in curls, Susan Olsen.

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Yes!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey there, Susan.

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Hello.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: "Susan, Susan, bo-busan, banana-fana-fo-fusan, me-mi-mo-musan..." (clears throat) hee hee hee... Susan, welcome to my show! How are you today?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: I'm fine, how are you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: De-lightful! I'm a big fan of you Brady kids. I have all your albums!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's true! I scratched them all myself!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Susan, does it terrify you to be on a talk show with a host as mighty as me?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Ummm, well, no, because I actually hadn't heard of this show...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I see.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well...

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Susan, has being a Brady ever held you back? You know, professionally?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: It was very difficult to get acting roles afterwards, because, y'know, I got very typecast...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Typecast, huh? (lisping) Hey, thay thomething "Thindy" to the audienthe, Thuthan.

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: (lisping) Theven thilver thwans twam thilently theaward.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (lisping) Thacre bleu! I'm gonna be thick!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Theriouthly!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (over PA system) Attention! Attention! Would the owner of a yellow Phantom Cruiser, license plate "S GHOST 1", please return to your ship, you're parked in an illegal towing zone.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That's you, stupid!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mmmmm? Oh... (mutters) Hold the fort, guys, I'll be right back. (he flies off) ("whoosh!")

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Er...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hi, Susan!

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Hello!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Look, every time I move my arm, it costs the Cartoon Network forty-two bucks! (evil laugh) Look, look! (moves his arm back and forth repeatedly) 42, 84, 126, ...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (bounds in to desk) Sorry to keep you waiting, but here I am, Spaaace Ghooost!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares in shock)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How's the car?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What's it to ya, volcano breath?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Huh?!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty! Now, what do we have here? Hmmm... So, you're one of those Brady kids, right?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: (puzzled) Uhhh...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Hmmm, you're not too bad looking. You must be the older, hotsy totsy one.

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Say what? (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Marsha, right? Oops, I meant Cindy! Crazy me! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: They, they, they always confuse us. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, sure they do. Maybe at the eye clinic, babe. You're the one who wore those bizarre little curls. How do you pull off a hair style like that anyway? Electroshock?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, and of course, I had to sleep with nine curlers on either side of my head every night, so I learned to sleep on my back.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (yawns in boredom)

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: It was painful.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, maybe you deserved it. Ever think of that?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Well, now, wait a minute...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Hey, are you related to those Olsen twins?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Um, no...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Because they're really freaky, y'know? They look like those awful troll dolls. I couldn't... (his communicator starts beeping) Oops, be right back (he flies off) ("whoosh!")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back to his desk) Hi, Susan, sorry that took so long.

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: (amused) Uh huh...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh... uh... Ah, skip it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, Susan, I was wondering, how's that Melvin the meat guy doing?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Um, well I think you're referring to Sam the butcher...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whatever, meat's meat. Do you think you could get me a good beef deal with him? A manly physique like mine requires a lot of sirloin!

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: Oh boy, well, y'know, he's not in business anymore, he, y'know, since he went to rehab and, I, I think he's in jail.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Egad! Well, that's the free marketplace for you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get a grip, Space Ghost! It was a TV show! Sam the butcher wasn't real!

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: This is true! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, just a TV show, eh? Not real, eh? Well, what does that make you, Mr. Doubting Mantis?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Well, y'know, um, uh... aargh.. so sue me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sniff sniff) I smell popcorn. Does anyone else smell popcorn?
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaagh! Get it off, get it off, get it off! (he blasts it with his destructo ray) Moltar, what in the wide world of extreme sports was that?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Heck if I know! Weird!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eerie.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (finally answers it after 7 rings) Hey, Space Ghost! Phone!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take a message.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's TV's Bonnie Franklin!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: TV's Bonnie Franklin?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I think she's got a part for you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Really? Susan, don't move a muscle, I'll be right back! (he flies off) ("whoosh!")

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to desk)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What did TV's Bonnie Franklin have to say?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Oh, well, none of your bee's wax. (looks at Susan) What's she still doing here? Who's next? (looks at his card) Whoa, mama! Moltar! Next guest!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But, uh...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Give me that walking, talking, hubba-hubba-looking dead chick, now!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you mean Elvira!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Of course I mean Elvira! What'cha got, rocks in your head?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, actually...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Shut up and give me Elvira.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, yeah. (throws switch, sending her to the studio monitor)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Heyyyy, baby, thanks for coming on my show!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Space Ghost, thank you for having me... so to speak.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Are you getting enough oxygen in there?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) What, in my dress, or in this room?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: She's saucy! So, what have you been doin' with yourself, ya little minx?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Well, gotta lot of things goin'...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Really!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Trying to get a new movie going.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Mmm hmm, cinema, good!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Uh, "Elvira vs. The Vampire Women".

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (makes "cat growl" sound)

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Working on a new book series, for young adults.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: You go, little vampire girl. I hope you've got a plush, satin-lined coffin, for all the beauty sleep you must take.

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Um, actually, I don't sleep in a coffin, I find a bed much more comfortable.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Space Ghost! (while Chad is talking) Space Ghost! Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (ignores Zorak) So do I. To me, beds are like graves, sweetie pie! 'Cause I dig 'em both!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What!?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh... are you feeling alright, Space Ghost? Not that I care, it's just that there's, something different about you tonight. I can't quite put my pincer on it...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (with a handlebar mustache and curlier beard now) Different? How so?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You're a little more... uh... rico suave all of a sudden.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (now sporting yet a different mustache and beard) (smiles, with bullfight music in background; his communicator beeps again) Oops! I'll be right back, gorgeous! And we'll get down to it!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Ooooo, sounds interesting!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (flies off) ("whoosh!")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back in) Stupid prank call. Rotten kids!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: (smiles at him)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaaagh! A vampire!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's not a vampire, Space Ghost, it's Elvira!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in low voice) What's she doing here? Where's Susan?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You told me to get rid of her!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I did not! Moltar, you get the scary hoochie-coochie girl off my monitor and get me Susan!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yadda yadda yadda yadda yadda... (throws switch, sends Elvira away and brings Susan back)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So Susan, did you know I was on TV in the seventies too?

transcript.speaker: Susan Olsen
transcript.dialogue: That's funny, 'cause...

transcript.speaker: Offcamera Voice
transcript.dialogue: Trick or treat!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Just a minute! I'll be right back, Susie. (invisos out)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back in)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yow!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What's the matter, Zorak? You're acting like you've just seen a ghost! (laughs) Moltar, Elvira!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hunh?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: I said Elvira! Now, now, now! (pounds fist)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ehh, here we go again!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Nothin' personal, sister, you're a Mary Ann, and I need a Ginger!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws switch again, sending Susan away again and bringing Elvira back)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Hey, baby, have you ever.. dated a ghost?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Well, uh, in my.. wildest dreams, I have.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well then how's about steppin' out with a ghost, like me?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Would I go out with a ghost like you? Ask me again.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (scoots closer) How about you and me cause some trouble tonight, hmmm, dark lady?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Oh, excellent!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Aaugh, thanks for that image!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: So, after the show?

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Sounds good to me!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Just you and me, alone, in the cold dead emptiness... of space (dance music starts in background) (Chad and Elvira wink & blink at each other)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back in, while Chad is still there)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Ugh!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaagh!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (gibbers) What!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What in the name of Jumanji is going on here? Who's this?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'm Space Ghost, baby.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost baby? I'm Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: I am!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I am!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Me me me me me me...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me me me me me me... (in unison)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Alright, I'll admit it! I'm not Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're not?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: No, I'm really... (dramatic sting music) Chad Ghostal, Tad's previously unseen evil twin escaped lunatic brother!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Chad! What are you doing here?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, I believe the TV Guide calls it a guest shot.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No no no, I mean, what do you want?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: The usual. Pain, suffering, misery...

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Mmmmm!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But why, Chad? Why?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: It's how I get my kicks, Tad-ikins. 'Cause I'm Chad Ghostal, Evil Twin. Right, baby? (cat growl)

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Alright.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Brace yourself for a sound butt-kicking, Tad. In 3D, and sensurround.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ha! Don't bet on it, Chad!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Moltar! Fifty bucks on the evil twin! (Holds up sign saying "ROUND 1")

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, guys, its... it's your mother.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mother?! (gasp)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Mother?! (gasp)

transcript.speaker: Mom Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Tad! Chad! I want you both to stop this nonsense this minute! You hear me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He started it!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Did not!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did too!

transcript.speaker: Mom Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, the both of you! Now Chad, I've spoken to you before about you trying to kill your brother, haven't I? Now you two stop fighting and be good, okay?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Okay, love you, Mom, Mommy, please forgive me, I'm sorry, Mommy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry, Mom, love you Mom.

transcript.speaker: Mom Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, I gotta go, my story's on. Bye bye, sugars!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bye, Mommy!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Bye, Mommy! (phone hangs up) Well, Tad, it's been real! Real stupid! Hey Elvira, you rocket from the crypt, you! I am outta here!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Alright! So am I! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: See you in the green room, in five!

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: Unpleasant dreams!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (flies off) ("whoosh!")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk) Well, you know what they say. (laughs) Any show you can walk away from is a good one.

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: (bounds in, looking exactly like Space Ghost but smaller) Spaaaace Ghoooost! Ah!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, brother!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) What is it now, Chad?

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Excuse me, I am Space Ghost, you duplicitous imposter! Beloved television r-r-r-raconteur and intergalactic do-gooder!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Give it up, Lokar, it's been done, to death!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Ehh, Lokar? But I am Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, I'm Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Alas and alack, I am scuttled! You've found me out! (pulls his mask off) You big lumpy lump!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts him with destructo ray)

transcript.speaker: Elvira
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Okay!
